name: Hey ! Can I have One ?
description:
This game was made for White Vault's Game Jam 
The theme was: Here, Take One
The Restriction Was :  3 Levels

In this game, you play as freelance waiters partnered with multiple restaurants. 
You have 3 shifts to make as much money as you can. 
at the start of each shift, you see customers arrive and place orders.
You go then to purchase the food they want and sell it back to them hoping they tip you if you are fast enough. Some times customers get sick because of the food, if that happens you need to drop everything and go get the medicine at the pharmacy otherwise they could die. 

You can play solo or with a friend locally. 
You can use a controller (preferred)  or Play on Keyboard. 

KEYBOARD : 

    [ WASD ] or [ Arrow Keys ]  to Move - [ Space ] to Jump 
    [ J ] to toss food 
    [ K ] to swap the food you carry 
    [ L ] to pickup or buy food 
    [ I ] for in-game help

Xbox Controller : 

    [ Left Stick ]   to Move - [ A ] to Jump 
    [ X ] to toss food 
    [ RB ] to swap the food you carry 
    [ B ] to pickup or buy food 
    [ LB] for in-game help

PS4 Controller : 

    [ Left Stick ]   to Move  - [ Cross ] to Jump 
    [ Square  ] to toss food 
    [ R1 ] to swap the food you carry 
    [ Circle ] to pickup or buy food 
    [ L1] for in-game help

Thank you to everybody that helped me make and play tested it especially   Vimlark, Ginger, and DapeachTV  for the feedback and the cheering

And a special thank you to bou-bou for the support and extra cheering :)
